title: You need a hot glue gun
text:
When you buy a craft kit for kids, the assumption is that it has what you need. Usually these sorts of things come with some glue or have stickers or something. This comes with a glue stick for a hot glue gun. My kids are too young for a hot glue gun.

It's okay if you want it to have to have a hot glue gun be required but that needs to be very clear in the description so people know. With this sort of simple craft, it would have been great if it came with everything you needed and you didn't get that surprise.

If that was resolved, it would have been fine otherwise. It was cute that it came with all the different animals and the quality was okay.
